verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, Fear <S%H3372><s%> not <S%H2865><s%>, neither be thou dismayed: take <S%H3947><s%> all the people <S%H5971><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> with thee <S%H6965><s%>, and arise, go up <S%H5927><s%> to Ai <S%H5857><s%>; see <S%H7200><s%>, I have given <S%H5414><s%> into thy hand <S%H3027><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%>, and his people <S%H5971><s%>, and his city <S%H5892><s%>, and his land <S%H776><s%>;

And thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%> to Ai <S%H5857><s%> and her king <S%H4428><s%> as thou didst <S%H6213><s%> unto Jericho <S%H3405><s%> and her king <S%H4428><s%>: only the spoil <S%H7998><s%> thereof <S%H929><s%>, and the cattle thereof <S%H962><s%>, shall ye take for a prey unto yourselves <S%H7760><s%>: set thee an ambush <S%H693><s%> for the city <S%H5892><s%> behind it <S%H310><s%>.

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%>, and all the people <S%H5971><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%>, to go up <S%H5927><s%> to Ai <S%H5857><s%>: and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> chose out <S%H977><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H1368><s%>, the mighty men <S%H376><s%> of valor <S%H2428><s%>, and sent them forth <S%H7971><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%>.

And he commanded <S%H6680><s%> them <S%H559><s%>, saying, Behold <S%H7200><s%>, ye shall lie in ambush <S%H693><s%> against the city <S%H5892><s%>, behind <S%H310><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>; go <S%H7368><s%> not very <S%H3966><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from the city <S%H5892><s%>, but be ye all ready <S%H3559><s%>:

and I <S%H5971><s%>, and all the people that are with me <S%H7126><s%>, will approach unto the city <S%H5892><s%>. And it shall come to pass <S%H3318><s%>, when they come out against <S%H7125><s%> us <S%H7223><s%>, as at the first, that we will flee <S%H5127><s%> before them <S%H6440><s%>;

and they will come out <S%H3318><s%> after <S%H310><s%> us <S%H5423><s%>, till we have drawn them away from the city <S%H5892><s%>; for they will say <S%H559><s%>, They flee <S%H5127><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> us <S%H7223><s%>, as at the first: so we will flee <S%H5127><s%> before them <S%H6440><s%>;

and ye shall rise up <S%H6965><s%> from the ambush <S%H693><s%>, and take possession <S%H3423><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>: for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will deliver <S%H5414><s%> it into your hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And it shall be <S%H8610><s%>, when ye have seized upon the city <S%H5892><s%>, that ye shall set <S%H3341><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> on fire <S%H784><s%>; according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall ye do <S%H6213><s%>: see <S%H7200><s%>, I have commanded you <S%H6680><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> sent them forth <S%H7971><s%>; and they went <S%H3212><s%> to the ambushment <S%H3993><s%>, and abode <S%H3427><s%> between Beth-el <S%H1008><s%> and Ai <S%H5857><s%>, on the west side <S%H3220><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%>: but Joshua <S%H3091><s%> lodged <S%H3885><s%> that night <S%H3915><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> arose up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and mustered <S%H6485><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, and went up <S%H5927><s%>, he and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> to Ai <S%H5857><s%>.

And all the people <S%H5971><s%>, even the men of war <S%H4421><s%> that were with him <S%H5927><s%>, went up, and drew nigh <S%H5066><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> before the city <S%H5892><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> on the north side <S%H6828><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%>: now there was a valley <S%H1516><s%> between him and Ai <S%H5857><s%>.

And he took <S%H3947><s%> about five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%>, and set <S%H7760><s%> them in ambush <S%H693><s%> between Beth-el <S%H1008><s%> and Ai <S%H5857><s%>, on the west side <S%H3220><s%> of the city <S%H5857><s%>.

So they set <S%H7760><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, even all the host <S%H4264><s%> that was on the north <S%H6828><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, and their liers-in <S%H6119><s%>-wait that were on the west <S%H3220><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>; and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> that night <S%H3915><s%> into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the valley <S%H6010><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H4428><s%>, when the king of Ai <S%H5857><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H4116><s%>, that they hasted and rose up early <S%H7925><s%>, and the men <S%H582><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%>, he and all his people <S%H5971><s%>, at the time appointed <S%H4150><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> the Arabah <S%H6160><s%>; but he knew <S%H3045><s%> not that there was an ambush <S%H693><s%> against him behind <S%H310><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and all Israel <S%H3478><s%> made as if they were beaten <S%H5060><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them <S%H5127><s%>, and fled by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

And all the people <S%H5971><s%> that were in the city <S%H5857><s%> were called <S%H2199><s%> together to pursue <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them <S%H7291><s%>: and they pursued after <S%H310><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, and were drawn away <S%H5423><s%> from the city <S%H5892><s%>.

And there was not a man <S%H376><s%> left <S%H7604><s%> in Ai <S%H5857><s%> or Beth-el <S%H1008><s%>, that went not out <S%H3318><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>: and they left <S%H5800><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> open <S%H6605><s%>, and pursued <S%H7291><s%> after Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, Stretch out <S%H5186><s%> the javelin <S%H3591><s%> that is in thy hand <S%H3027><s%> toward Ai <S%H5857><s%>; for I will give <S%H5414><s%> it into thy hand <S%H3027><s%>. And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> stretched out <S%H5186><s%> the javelin <S%H3591><s%> that was in his hand <S%H3027><s%> toward the city <S%H5892><s%>.

And the ambush <S%H693><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> quickly <S%H4120><s%> out of their place <S%H4725><s%>, and they ran <S%H7323><s%> as soon as he had stretched out <S%H5186><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%>, and entered <S%H935><s%> into the city <S%H5892><s%>, and took <S%H3920><s%> it <S%H4116><s%>; and they hasted and set <S%H3341><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> on fire <S%H784><s%>.

And when the men <S%H582><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%> looked <S%H6437><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> them <S%H7200><s%>, they saw, and <S%H6227><s%>, behold, the smoke of the city <S%H5892><s%> ascended up <S%H5927><s%> to heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and they had no power <S%H3027><s%> to flee <S%H5127><s%> this way or that way <S%H2008><s%>: and the people <S%H5971><s%> that fled <S%H5127><s%> to the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> turned back <S%H2015><s%> upon the pursuers <S%H7291><s%>.

And when Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and all Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that the ambush <S%H693><s%> had taken <S%H3920><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>, and that the smoke <S%H6227><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> ascended <S%H5927><s%>, then they turned again <S%H7725><s%>, and slew <S%H5221><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%>.

And the others <S%H428><s%> came forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the city <S%H5892><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> them <S%H8432><s%>; so they were in the midst of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, some on this side <S%H5221><s%>, and some on that side: and they smote them <S%H5704><s%>, so that they let <S%H7604><s%> none of them remain <S%H8300><s%> or escape <S%H6412><s%>.
And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%> they took <S%H8610><s%> alive <S%H2416><s%>, and brought <S%H7126><s%> him to Joshua <S%H3091><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H3478><s%>, when Israel had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of slaying <S%H2026><s%> all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%>, in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> wherein they pursued <S%H7291><s%> them <S%H5307><s%>, and they were all fallen by the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>, until they were consumed <S%H8552><s%>, that all Israel <S%H3478><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> unto Ai <S%H5857><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

And all that fell <S%H5307><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%>, both of men <S%H376><s%> and women <S%H802><s%>, were twelve <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>, even all the men <S%H376><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%>.

For Joshua <S%H3091><s%> drew <S%H7725><s%> not back <S%H7725><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%>, wherewith he stretched out <S%H5186><s%> the javelin <S%H3591><s%>, until he had utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%>.

Only the cattle <S%H929><s%> and the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of that city <S%H5892><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> took for prey <S%H962><s%> unto themselves <S%H1697><s%>, according unto the word of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> which he commanded <S%H6680><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%>.
So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> burnt <S%H8313><s%> Ai <S%H5857><s%>, and made <S%H7760><s%> it a heap <S%H8510><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>, even a desolation <S%H8077><s%>, unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%> he hanged <S%H8518><s%> on a tree <S%H6086><s%> until the eventide <S%H6256><s%>: and at the going down <S%H935><s%> of the sun <S%H8121><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%>, and they took <S%H3381><s%> his body <S%H5038><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from the tree <S%H6086><s%>, and cast <S%H7993><s%> it at the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, and raised <S%H6965><s%> thereon a great <S%H1419><s%> heap <S%H1530><s%> of stones <S%H68><s%>, unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.
Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, in mount <S%H2022><s%> Ebal <S%H5858><s%>,

as Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, as it is written <S%H3789><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>, an altar <S%H4196><s%> of unhewn <S%H8003><s%> stones <S%H68><s%>, upon which no man had lifted up <S%H5130><s%> any iron <S%H1270><s%>: and they offered <S%H5927><s%> thereon burnt-offerings <S%H5930><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> peace-offerings <S%H5930><s%>.

And he wrote <S%H3789><s%> there upon the stones <S%H68><s%> a copy <S%H4932><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>, which he wrote <S%H3789><s%>, in the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And all Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and their elders <S%H2205><s%> and officers <S%H7860><s%>, and their judges <S%H8199><s%>, stood <S%H5975><s%> on this side of the ark <S%H727><s%> and on that side before the priests <S%H3548><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, that bare <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, as well the sojourner <S%H1616><s%> as the homeborn <S%H249><s%>; half <S%H2677><s%> of them in <S%H413><s%> front <S%H4136><s%> of mount <S%H2022><s%> Gerizim <S%H1630><s%>, and half <S%H2677><s%> of them in front <S%H4136><s%> of mount <S%H2022><s%> Ebal <S%H5858><s%>; as Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> at the first <S%H7223><s%>, that they should bless <S%H1288><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And afterward <S%H310><s%> he read <S%H7121><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%>, the blessing <S%H1293><s%> and the curse <S%H7045><s%>, according to all that is written <S%H3789><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%>.

There was not a word <S%H1697><s%> of all that Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%>, which Joshua <S%H3091><s%> read <S%H7121><s%> not before all the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and the women <S%H802><s%>, and the little ones <S%H2945><s%>, and the sojourners <S%H1616><s%> that were <S%H1980><s%> among them <S%H7130><s%>.
